recipes.label: Delivering A Package
recipes.startdescription: As I walk the streets of Old London, a great melancholy overtakes me. How many hours did I wander these streets as a youth, never finding what I was looking for?
recipes.description: I keep my eye on the curves of the river, and before long I spot a hidden little window bleeding dirty yellow light.

recipes.label: Plot a Course
recipes.startdescription: Now to unravel the instructions. As a captain, I am used to navigating, but riddles? Well, they form an amusing exertion at least.
recipes.description: A solved puzzle is just a page of lines, and a sense of accomplishment.

recipes.label: Morland
recipes.startdescription:
"... But if you can deliver messages discretely, our lot can pay you well."

Before I can even try to hand her the package, she pulls me inside. She studies my face.

"...and I think I might have another opportunity for you."

recipes.label: Morland
recipes.startdescription:
All night she tells me stories. Stories about someone, something, she calls the Centipede, and her pilgrimage up the waterfall at the edge of the world.

"One that flows at the threshold between the Wake and Myth."

recipes.label: Morland
recipes.startdescription:
"You can't dream, can you? In a way, you're like her. Even for you, there is a way out, beyond the wind, behind the rain."

My broken heart aches. Could there truly be a way out of this muted world?
recipes.description:
Her eyes glint like candlelight.

"Think it over. In the meantime, didn't you have something for me?"

recipes.label: Delivering A Peculiar Package
recipes.startdescription: "Ah, yes, the other reason for your visit. Great. What would like to receive in exchange? Surely not money. Knowledge? I have plenty to trade."

slots.label: Intent
slots.description: What kind of reward do I want?

recipes.label: Delivered A Peculiar Package
recipes.description:
"Here's for you. As payment."

As I hand her the package, she sifts through a drawer and hands me two crisp envelopes.

"Would you deliver that in a hurry for me please? It isn't far, and I'm quite sure the recipients will reward you greatly for your trouble."

recipes.label: Pull a Thread
recipes.startdescription: If I weigh the local news I have scavenged in bars against the snippets I have obtained from my contacts, I may be able to make new connections, find new opportunities and discover truly extraordinary places.
